subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk capped New Jersey’s three-goal first period with his N.H.L.-leading fourth short-handed goal, and the host Devils beat the mistake-prone Philadelphia Flyers, 5-2.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk capped New Jersey’s three-goal first period with his N.H.L.-leading fourth short-handed goal, and the host Devils beat the mistake-prone Philadelphia Flyers, 5-2.
